GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an object for the specified article id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles, filtered by topic specified in query, and in specified order (see query options). The body property is removed and adds a comment count property.  Pagination possible by queries limit and p.

articles.author: icellusedkars
articles.title: Eight pug gifs that remind me of mitch

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments on the specified article id, most recent first

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves an array of all comments on the specified article id, most recent first

postedComment.body: this is a truly wonderful piece of journalism
postedComment.author: lurker

example request body.body: this is a truly wonderful piece of journalism

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates votes on specified article and returns updated article object

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes specified comment from database, no content response

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users on key of users

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object with details of the specified user

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: allows incrementing the votes on specified comment and returns updated comment object
